title: Albania appoints AI-generated minister to avoid corruption
description: TIRANA, Albania: Albanian Prime Minister Edi Rama said Thursday he had appointed the world’s first AI-generated government minister to oversee public tenders, promising its artificial intelligence would make it “corruption-free.” Presenting his new cabinet at a meeting of his Socialist Party following a big May election victory, Rama introduced the new “member,” named “Diella”
content:

title: AI-powered eye scan predicts risk of cognitive decline and dementia
description: A new study led by researchers from the Yong Loo Lin School of Medicine at the National University of Singapore (NUS Medicine) has demonstrated that artificial intelligence (AI) analysis of retinal photographs can predict an individual's risk of cognitive decline and dementia. Published in Alzheimer's & Dementia, this first-of-its-kind study in Singapore highlights the potential of retinal aging biomarkers as a novel tool for brain health management.
content: A new study led by researchers from the Yong Loo Lin School of Medicine at the National University of Singapore (NUS Medicine) has demonstrated that artificial intelligence (AI) analysis of retinal photographs can predict an individual's risk of cogn... [4325 chars]

title: Turbolearn AI: The Future of AI Study Tools for Smarter Learning
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is reshaping the way we live, work, and learn. In education, AI-powered platforms are transforming traditional study methods into smart, personalized learning experiences. Among these innovations, Turbolearn stands out as a powerful AI study tool designed to help students, educators, and lifelong learners study smarter, not harder. What is Turbolearn AI? Turbolearn […]

title: FTC investigating AI ‘companion’ chatbots amid growing concern about harm to kids
description: By Clare Duffy, CNN New York (CNN) — The Federal Trade Commission has launched an investigation into seven tech companies around potential harms their artificial intelligence chatbots could cause to children and teenagers.
